results.content:
(initial review after completing HTML+PHP+MySQL+Master Project)

Yes, it was a very good match for me.  Although I knew beginner level HTML+CSS+PHP, I didn't have any idea how to bring them all together to create a dynamic website, but thanks to well-prepared lessons and Mr. Radkov's clear teaching using simple English (important for ESL learners like me) with adequate font size and clear audio, I now have coded along and built two apps—a cool weather forecast app in which I can even see my own city Bangalore's weather forecast for the next 7 days and a 4-hour-and-still-counting Master Project which is exhaustive and covers so many important features present in any website.  

Thanks, Mr. Radkov, for creating and sharing this all-in-one mega course with us, and I wish you all the best for the remainder of the series, future courses, and for Radkov Academy.

response.content:
Thank you for the detailed review Umesh!
I am very happy to hear that you've enjoyed the course and gained valuable information that will help you achieve your goals.

Thank you again!
